content.raw:
Sorry for the delay. Seems good to me!

* There is non-standard indentation (2 spaces instead of 4) in lines 1480 to 1484.
* Is there a contradiction between the default file-open path ending in ".df" (line 2214), but the open dialog showing only ".msg" files?
* There is a comment typo on line 2239: desceing -> descending

Sorry for the delay. Seems good to me!

  • There is non-standard indentation (2 spaces instead of 4) in lines 1480 to 1484.
  • Is there a contradiction between the default file-open path ending in ".df" (line 2214), but the open dialog showing only ".msg" files?
  • There is a comment typo on line 2239: desceing -> descending
